projects.name: Authentication and Authorization
projects.description: The AAA component provides the ability to change the underlying Authorization and Authentication of OpenDaylight.

projects.name: BGP and PCEP
projects.description: The BGP/PCEP component provides the ability to interact with BGP routers dynamically and compute the appropriate paths.

projects.name: Software Defined Networking Interface
projects.description: SDNI provides the ability to have intercontroller communication using BGP in a federated environment.

projects.name: Software Defined Networking interface)
projects.description: LISP Flow Mapping provides the ability to apply LISP on flows
